snippet: Rabbi Elyashiv’s influential decisions applying the Torah and Talmudic law to modern times sometimes roiled Israeli politics.
abstract: Rabbi Yosef Shalom Elyashiv, authority in the Orthodox Jewish world on applying the Torah and Talmudic law to modern times, dies at age 102.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Elyashiv’s influential decisions applying the Torah and Talmudic law to modern times sometimes roiled Israeli politics.

headline.main: Rabbi Y. S. Elyashiv, Master of Talmudic Law, Dies at 102
headline.print_headline: Rabbi Y. S. Elyashiv, Master of Talmudic Law, Dies at 102
